Name: Azure Blob Storage set CORS Rule
Description: Set a given CORS rule on the specified Azure storage blob container
Author: jonsamwell

Parameters.Name: PublishSettingsFile
Parameters.Label: Publish Settings File
Parameters.HelpText: Absolute path on the tentacle to the Azure publishsettings file to use. Eg. C:\Azure\Azure.publishsettings

Parameters.Name: StorageAccount
Parameters.Label: Storage Account
Parameters.HelpText: The Azure Storage Account to use.

Parameters.Name: StorageAccountKey
Parameters.Label: Storage Account Key
Parameters.HelpText: The primary or secondary key for the Azure Storage Account.

Parameters.Name: AllowedHeaders
Parameters.Label: Allowed Headers
Parameters.HelpText: The allowed headers for the CORS rule

Parameters.Name: AllowedOrigins
Parameters.Label: Allowed Origins
Parameters.HelpText: The allowed origins for the CORS rule

Parameters.Name: MaxAgeInSeconds
Parameters.Label: Max Age In Seconds
Parameters.HelpText: The max age in seconds that a pre-flight response can be cached on the client for.

Parameters.Name: AllowedMethods
Parameters.Label: Allowed Methods
Parameters.HelpText: The allowed HTTP methods for the CORS rule
